page.title: 16Our School
page.content: Our school is{King's Wood First school.We have a big playground,a big playing field and an orchard. Every Tuesday we go swimming in the Middle school pool. When our teacher is on playground duty our class is allowed to play on the concrete humps and benches. Recently we went on an outing to Thorpe Park.We had a lovely time there. Lots of visitors come to our school.We have the community policeman who comes to talk to us.There is sometimes a visit by the doctor or the dentist and sometimes the nurse comes to check our hair to see if we have nits.If you have nits you get special shampoo to wash your hair and kill the nits. When the weather is fine we play on the field and make daisy chains or we go into the orchard to pick flowers.
